articles.description: Glasgow Live got a first look inside the new state-of-the-art cinema - including reclining luxury chairs, a modern bar and lounge and touchscreen technology.
articles.content:
A brand new Vue cinema is set to open in Glasgow's St Enoch Centre later this month in line with the easing of lockdown restrictions.
 The venue is scheduled to open as part of the reopening of all … [+2834 chars]
